name: A pair of shockburned plate gauntlets
data: It increases the users strength strongly.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom pitifully.
It decreases the users intelligence pitifully.
It has awesome armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than average.
It increases the users electric resistance adequately.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
